title: Code Geass: Hangyaku no Lelouch Picture Drama - Hajimari no Zenya

synonyms: Code Geass: Hangyaku no Lelouch Picture Drama Stage 0.97
Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebillion Picture Drama 10
alternative_titles.en: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion Picture Drama - The Night of the Beginning
alternative_titles.ja: コードギアス 反逆のルルーシュ ピクチャードラマ STAGE 0.97 はじまりの前夜

synopsis:
A special included with the Blu-Ray release of the main series. Lelouch monologues on his dissatisfaction with Britannia's rule and the need to hide his and Nunnally's connection to the Britannian throne.

(Source: Wikipedia)
